categories: Category:Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi

nodes.text: The Weapon of a Jedi, Part 2

"The Weapon of a Jedi, Part 2" (German: "Die Waffe eines Jedi, Teil 2") is the second installment of the comic strip "Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi." It was written by Alec Worley and drawn by Ruairí Coleman, with colors by Chris O'Halloran. It was printed in issue 20 of "Star Wars - The Official Magazine" and published on May 24, 2017.
